title: Sunrise360
author: Sunrise360
content: I observed several changes in the price  within a few months. With these changes, I wish to ask do you think the price of Bitcoin will ever hit $40k again?I'm just being curious as a new trader.

comments.author: Davidvictorson
comments.created_time: August 14, 2022, 07:46:12 PMLast edit: August 14, 2022, 08:03:22 PM by Davidvictorson
comments.body: Quote from: Sunrise360 on August 14, 2022, 07:41:27 PMI observed several changes in the price  within a few months. With these changes, I wish to ask do you think the price of Bitcoin will ever hit $40k again?I'm just being curious as a new trader.Bitcoin at $40k in a few months is possible if everything falls right in place. But the reality is that nobody knows when everything will fall in place. There are a lot of factors involved. Bitcoin price has been struggling to stay at $24k since the past week. 40K price in a few months (say 3 - 6months) in my opinion is not attainable just yet.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Quote from: Sunrise360 on August 14, 2022, 07:41:27 PMI wish to ask do you think the price of Bitcoin will ever hit $40k again?In my personal opinion,  I would say yes,  it is highly possible for the price of bitcoin to hit $40k again,  but when this is going to happen is what no body knows.It can happen in about a week from now,  it can happen in one month,  it can be in a year or it might even take up to five years before we see bitcoin trading at a price of $40k and above.

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Quote from: Sunrise360 on August 14, 2022, 07:41:27 PM I wish to ask do you think the price of Bitcoin will ever hit $40k again?I'm just being curious as a new trader.It's very likely that it will hit $40,000 again, it may not be this week or this month, but be sure that one day it will. If $40K is your target, then I believe you won't be disappointed. The most important virtue you have to practice as a trader who holds Bitcoin for long term gains is patience.

comments.author: Jemzx00
comments.body: There's a high possibility the bitcoin will reach $40,000 or maybe even more soon however it will be hard to speculate the exact time or date on when it will happen. I highly suggest to wait a few months or even at least a year for the current price of bitcoin to double. Right now, it's best to accumulate more and more bitcoin and wait for long term results on your investment and accumulation.Also, you can check out the history of Bitcoin's price chart and you'll be able to see some patterns and indicators that we might reach a higher price at a later date. But still there's a chance that things might go the wrong way and we might see some dipping depending on the situation.

comments.author: Vaculin
comments.body: Quote from: Sunrise360 on August 14, 2022, 07:41:27 PMI observed several changes in the price  within a few months. With these changes, I wish to ask do you think the price of Bitcoin will ever hit $40k again?I'm just being curious as a new trader. I am always confident to say that bitcoin will reach a higher value, but the problem is we can't tell exactly as to when it will happen, maybe before the end of this year or probably early next year. However, if things will always be good for bitcoin and with the crypto market, then we can eventually witness bitcoin price surging in the next possible months. But if there will be unexpected negative news that will hit the market, most likely bitcoin will also be affected and will continue to have a downward trend in its price.

comments.author: TelolettOm
comments.body: So far, we have been experiencing the cycle between bearish and bullish era. If we see from that aspect, I really believe that BTC is able to reach $40k again and more, much higher in the next bullish era. I really bel8evvle this happen. The market has dropped so much and now this still keeps struggling during this bearish market. If the market is getting better too welcome bullish, the increase to $40k may be faster. The question is when this will happen. We may be abke to predict but we cannot predict it it 100%. We still need waiting.

comments.author: KennyR
comments.body: We might experience $40k in the upcoming week. We don't know how the market movement takes place. This is the reality of the bitcoin market. There is sign of bullish movement and this can make some positive changes in the entire cryptocurrency market. If something big as an adoption or some big corporate network makes a entry we can see a massive change in the price.

comments.author: Fundamentals Of
comments.body: Not only will the price of Bitcoin reach $40,000 once again, it will even double that or even triple or quadruple. That $69,000 ATH is not the last ATH that Bitcoin will reach. I am still very much convinced that $100,000 is not just a wishful thinking. It will eventually come true. It's just a matter of time before it will finally be seen on the charts. $40,000 is just a mere short-term target. It could easily be achieved. I even guess that before this year ends Bitcoin has already surpassed $40,000.
